ModMetaData.name: Drop Pod Shuttle
ModMetaData.author: celphcs30
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a craftable drop pod shuttle that can transport up to 10 Space Marines. The drop pod uses vertical-only movement (straight down landing, straight up takeoff) just like traditional drop pods, not horizontal flight like shuttles.
[h1]Features[/h1] [list] [*] Craftable drop pod shuttle (4x4 size) [*] Transports up to 10 Space Marines (3000kg capacity) [*] Vertical-only movement (drop pod style, not shuttle flight) [*] Requires chemfuel for travel (900 capacity, 5 per tile, 60 minimum) [*] 1.5 hour cooldown between launches [*] Paintable to match your chapter colors [/list]
[h1]Credits[/h1] Assets (graphics, sounds, turret) from RimDark 40k - Mankinds Finest by Phonicmas, Mewn Goddess, Grim Cheese and UnfortunateДруг
Original mod: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3505068525
